name: The Edge Cases
description:
Demo build only

Crime lab and detective management.

Those who have supressed their conscience have become beasts whos influence grows as they spread corruption further. You must track down these beasts and eliminate them.

  • Build and manage a crime lab
  • Determine the perpetrator of crimes
  • Delve into the beasts lair, navigate and explore using abilities
  • Turn based combat system using a unique weakness gauge system
